title: SUPER[v2008.build.30] - The Ultimate Encoder/Multimedia Player
description:
SUPER Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â© v2008.build.30 (Mar 22, 2008)

SUPER Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â© "The Player" surpasses any known player by supporting just any Multimedia file
format. 
SUPER Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â© plays files that cannot be played with WMP or even MPC and VLC the advanced 
Libavcodec based players. SUPER Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â© also plays and saves Internet Media Streams of different 
protocols ( mms, rtsp, http )

SUPER Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â© "The Encoder" is the fastest and simplest tool to encode full length movies to any 
other format without any time or function limitation.

SUPER has the ability to save streaming links from the internet for later conversion. 
Because SUPER can convert Flash Video to almost any other format, users can convert videos 
captured from video sites to other formats for other media players. SUPER can also directly 
convert between different container formats, where the content video and/or audio streams 
are poured directly from one container to another, without altering content. 
The user selects specifications like bitrate, framerate, audio channels, resolution, 
sampling rate, and aspect ratio.[1]

File Format Support

SUPER can play and transcode a variety of File formats:

Video

    * 3GP
    * ASF
    * AVI
    * DAT
    * FLIC animation (FLI and FLC)
    * Flash Video (FLV)
    * MPEG (both MPEG-1 and MPEG-2)
    * Matroska
    * MPEG-4 Part 14 container (MP4)
    * OGG Theora/Vorbis
    * Quicktime movie (MOV and QT)
    * RealVideo (RAM and RM)
    * str
    * Shockwave Flash (SWF)
    * MPEG transport stream (TS and M2T)
    * trp
    * VIV (input only)
    * DVD video files (VOB)
    * Windows Media Video (WMV)

Audio

    * aac
    * AC3
    * AMR
    * SMAF cell phone audio (MMF)
    * MP2
    * MP3
    * Musepack audio (MPC)
    * OGG Vorbis
    * RealAudio (RA)
    * WAV

Other

    * Avisynth scripts (AVS)
    * Animated GIF images

Available Preset Output Profiles

    * 3gp (Nokia/NEC/Siemens)
    * 3gp (Sony Ericsson)
    * 3g2 (Sony Ericsson)
    * aac (Audio Only)
    * ac3 (Audio Only)
    * amr (Audio Only - Nokia...)
    * asf
    * avi
    * avi (for Pocket PC)
    * gif (for making Avatars)
    * mmf (SMAF Audio Only)
    * mov
    * mp2 (Audio Only)
    * mp3 (Audio Only)
    * mp4
    * mpc (Audio Only)
    * mpg (Mpeg I)
    * mpg (Mpeg II)
    * mpg (.DAT to .MPG) VCD
    * mpg VCD Compliant
    * mpg SVCD Compliant
    * ogg
    * swf or flv (Flash)
    * vob DVD Compliant
    * vob (.TS / .M2T to .VOB)
    * wav (Audio Only)
    * wma (Audio Only)
    * wmv
    * AutoMode
    * Apple - iPod
    * Apple - iPod 5.5G
    * Microsoft - Zune
    * Nintendo - DS
    * Sony - PS3
    * Sony - PSP
    * Sequence Of Images

Back End

SUPER&#039;s back end consists of the following free software:

    * ffmpeg
    * Mencoder
    * MPlayer
    * x264
    * ffmpeg2theora
    * libavcodec
    * Theora/Vorbis RealProducer plugIn

According to the wikipedia article several malware scanners have reported suspicious files in this latest build. These are false positives.
I have scanned it myself with AVG and it scanned clean, I have also being using this program for a while now, and it does a great job.
